mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_POST WHERE A_ID IN (SELECT A_ID FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE S_ID = #{sId})

SELECT a_post_id , a_id , a_img_id , a_name, a_post_content, a_start_date, a_min_people, a_reservation_deadline, a_view_cnt, a_favorite_cnt, a_post_date_created FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A_POST_DATE_CREATED DESC) NUM, P.*, A.a_name, A.a_start_date, A.min_people, A.a_reservation_deadline FROM ACTIVITY_POST P WHERE A_ID IN (SELECT A_ID FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE S_ID = #{sId})) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM ACTIVITY_CUSTOMER WHERE A_ID = #{postId}) A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.U_ID = M.U_ID) JOIN RESERVATION R ON (R.U_ID = M.U_ID) WHERE R.A_ID = #{postId}

SELECT U_NICK, U_NAME, U_TEL, U_EMAIL, RESERVATION_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_DATE DESC) NUM, M.U_NICK, M.U_NAME, M.U_TEL, M.U_EMAIL, R.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM (SELECT U_ID, ACT_CUS_CNT FROM ACTIVITY_CUSTOMER WHERE A_POST_ID = #{POSTID}) A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.U_ID = M.U_ID) JOIN RESERVATION R ON (R.U_ID = M.U_ID) WHERE R.A_ID = ${POSTID}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
